creator: gregg.morris@gmail.com
text: I needed more control over table look-and-feel, so I added methods to set/get the inside horizontal and vertical borders, and the cell margins. I also added an enum type to map some XWPF-level values to the XMLBean-level values.

Created attachment 28239
Patch file generated by ant

This is the patch.tar.gz file created by ant. It contains the cahnges to the XWPFTable.java and TestXWPFTable.java files.
creator: gregg.morris@gmail.com
